Message.Title: Motley Fool
Message.Msg: What is it with these folks? One they are for, the next their not. I'm not reading any more of their material.

Topic.Title: Warren Buffet: cap gain 30%, 50% tax on the rich

Message.Msg: increase the tax on the wealthy. None of us posters are wealthy so why stick up for them? They don't care about you. Most invest their money in Asia hedge funds.

Topic.Title: ObamaCare causes Medical giant Stryker to cut 1,170 jobs

Message.Msg: the fact of the federal govt. overpaying for $200 hammers was for photo op sessions. Some supplies are speciality and can't be bought over the counter. Most medical supply companies gouge the govt. anyway. Ever heard of medicare fraud by drs. and business? I thought so
